HKQuery  predicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(isArchived:) Type MethodpredicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(isArchived:)iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+class func predicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(isArchived: Bool) -> NSPredicate Parameters isArchivedThe archived status of the medication. Ex: True will match medications in the archived section in the Health App.

Creates a predicate for use with HKUserAnnotatedMedicationQuery.

Creates a query predicate that matches HKUserAnnotatedMedication objects that have the archived status specified.

Type Method# predicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(isArchived:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
class func predicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(isArchived: Bool) -> NSPredicate
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuery/predicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(isArchived:)#parameters)

`isArchived`The archived status of the medication. Ex: True will match medications in the archived section in the Health App.

## [Discussion](/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuery/predicateForUserAnnotatedMedications(isArchived:)#discussion)

Creates a predicate for use with HKUserAnnotatedMedicationQuery.

Creates a query predicate that matches HKUserAnnotatedMedication objects that have the archived status specified.
